briefTitle: IIT2023-09-Chung-UpfrontTAD: Upfront TAD/SNB in Patients With Breast Cancer With Nodal Metastases
officialTitle: IIT2023-09-Chung-UpfrontTAD: Upfront TAD/SNB in Patients With Clinical T1-2N0 ER+ Her2- Breast Cancer With Ultrasound Detected Nodal Metastases
conditions: Breast Cancer, Axillary Nodal Disease, Female Breast Cancer, Axilla; Breast, Mastectomy; Lymphedema, Tumor, Breast
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Women age ≥ 45
* Clinical T1-2N0 ER+ invasive breast cancer
* US detected biopsy proven axillary nodal disease
* Written informed consent obtained from subject and ability for subject to comply with the requirements of the study.

Exclusion Criteria:

* Palpable nodes on physical exam
* Her2+ or ER- invasive breast cancer
* Extranodal extension \> 3 mm on nodal biopsy
* More than 2 suspicious nodes on preoperative imaging
